column2: TINDAKMALAYSIA NETWORK SERVICES PLT (TINDAK MALAYSIA)

Election Commission of Malaysia (SPR), Tindak Malaysia (2023), Attorney General Chambers, Berita Harian (https://www.bharian.com.my/berita/nasional/2023/11/1176401/bekas-panglima-atm-raja-mohamed-affandi-calon-bn-di-prk-kemaman), Facebook (https://web.facebook.com/BKBROfficial/posts/biodata-menteri-besar-terengganu-ke-15maklumat-umumnama-dr-ahmad-samsuri-bin-mok/2173516202878910/?_rdc=1&_rdr)

This is the non-gazetted official results from SPR. Up to 22 saluran level data is missing as SPR Facebook live did not display the results. Majority of scheduled early voters became postal voters.TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for any errors or ommissions arising from the original data or its derivatives
FIELD DESCRIPTION
Composite between Parliamentary Code and DUN Code (Unique Identifier)
State Name
Ballot Type (Postal, Early or Normal/Ordinary Vote)
Parliamentary Code (2018 - present at the Created Date)
Parliamentary Name (2018 - present at the Created Date)
State Constituency (DUN) Code (2018 - present at the Created Date)
State Constituency (DUN) Name (2018 - present at the created Date)
Polling District Code (2018 - present at the Created Date)
Polling District Name (2018 - present at the Created Date)
Polling Centre for Kemaman By-Election 2023
Voting Channel Number for Kemaman By-Election 2023 (Saluran)
Total number of ballot papers issued at the poll (as in A in all Form 14 + A in Form 15)
Barisan Nasional (BN) Component Party
Barisan Nasional Candidate Name as per the Government Gazette (Form 8)
Male/Female Classification
Age of Barisan Nasional Candidate
Barisan Nasional Valid Vote for the Candidate
Perikatan Nasional (PN) Component Party
Perikatan Nasional Candidate Name as per the Government Gazette (Form 8)
Male/Female Classification
Age of Perikatan Nasional Candidate
Perikatan Nasional Valid Vote for the Candidate
Total number of votes by electors
Total number of rejected ballot papers (as in C in all Form 14 + C in Form 15)
Total number of ballot papers issued but not put in the ballot box (as in D in all Form 14) and not returned (as in D in Form 15) (B-C-D)
United Malays National Organisation
Parti Islam Se-Malaysia
